title: Tebah (Place)
content:
TEBAH (Place)

Tebah was a city that belonged to King Hadadezer. King David took a large amount of bronze from this city during battle (2 Samuel 8:8; 1 Chronicles 18:8). Hadadezer was the king of Zobah, an area located in the Hamath region in Syria. Because of this connection, Tebah was probably located somewhere in that same region.
